Texts.Chs: 我认为所有人都不应该吃图钉。
Texts.Eng: I don't think anyone should eat thumbtacks.

Texts.Chs: 我看到它们就和一群蠢货一样，于是我选择了杀戮。
Texts.Eng: I grew weary of watching Jersey Shore like all the other idiots out there. I turned to murder, instead.

Texts.Chs: 我从来没有见过独角兽会喷火，你呢？
Texts.Eng: I've never seen a unicorn that farts fire before. Have you?
